structure.unit: Nominations, Questions To Be Submitted To The Voters, Primaries And Caucuses

law.text: If an error or informality is found in any nomination paper, it shall be forthwith returned to the secretary of the committee by whom it was filed, for correction; and if not corrected and again filed before five oâ€™clock in the afternoon of the day following its return to said secretary, it shall be void.
